item.title: Stuff I REALLY Recommend
item.description: Video Talks Justice: What’s the Right Thing To Do?. Provocative Harvard lecture series on Ethics. Robert Sapolsky: The Biology of Human Behavior. Stanford lecture series. Are you in control of your decisions and personality? Maybe not as much as you think. John Ioannidis: “Reproducible Research: True or False?”. Unsettling results: 70%-80% of scientific studies, even from cited, reputable sources, are wrong. On the dangers of ignoring reproducibility in science.
